channel.title: AtmoVantage IPFS
channel.description: Your Advantage in the IPFS Environment

item.title: Welcome to the Web3
item.dc:creator: Austin
item.description: This website is built using WordPress, but then converted to a static site and is hosted on the IPFS (InterPlanetary File System). The IPFS is a decentralized, censorship-proof, peer-to-peer blockchain used to store and retrieve files. Welcome to the next generation of the Internet: Web3. Learn more about IPFS here.
item.content:encoded:
This website is built using WordPress, but then converted to a static site and is hosted on the IPFS (InterPlanetary File System). The IPFS is a decentralized, censorship-proof, peer-to-peer blockchain used to store and retrieve files. Welcome to the next generation of the Internet: Web3.

Learn more about IPFS here.
